about_the_game:
Dive into the mythical realms with the Age of Mythology: Retold Original Soundtrack, a captivating journey through the epic soundscapes that bring the gods, heroes, and legends of ancient civilizations to life.

Enjoy 15 tracks on this soundtrack, each track is a masterwork of musical storytelling, blending traditional instruments with modern orchestration to evoke the grandeur and mystery of the mythological world. Whether you're a long-time fan or new to the series, this soundtrack will transport you to the heart of the ancient world, where gods and mortals collide in epic tales of power and glory. Available in both WAV and MP3.
